mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN transaction_type = '収入' THEN amount ELSE 0 END), 0) AS totalIncome, COALESCE(SUM(CASE WHEN transaction_type = '支出' THEN amount ELSE 0 END), 0) AS totalExpense FROM household_transactions

SELECT id, transaction_date AS transactionDate, transaction_type AS transactionType, amount, category, payment_method AS paymentMethod, description FROM household_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date desc
SELECT id, transaction_date AS transactionDate, transaction_type AS transactionType, amount, category, payment_method AS paymentMethod, description FROM household_transactions WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO household_transactions (transaction_date, transaction_type, amount, category, payment_method, description) VALUES (#{transaction.transactionDate}, #{transaction.transactionType}, #{transaction.amount}, #{transaction.category}, #{transaction.paymentMethod}, #{transaction.description})
